qas.question: Who accused the Arab government of practicing acts of racism?

context: American University <a4_0>economist<a4_0/> <a0_0>George Ayittey<a0_0/> accused <a1_0>the Arab government<a1_0/> of Sudan of practicing acts of racism against black citizens. According to Ayittey, "In Sudan... the Arabs monopolized power and excluded <a2_0>blacks<a2_0/> – Arab apartheid." Many African commentators joined Ayittey in accusing <a3_0>Sudan<a3_0/> of practising Arab apartheid.
